attributes.action: Do more to irradicate human traffiking in the U.K and the world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you probably know human traffiking is a huge problem and is one of the worlds fastest growing trades, with at least 12.3 million people are victims of forced labour worldwide.  Of these 2.4 million are as a result of human trafficking. More needs to be done about this issue and the Government needs to be doing something about it!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Do more to irradicate human traffiking in the U.K and the world."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13449.asp

Prime Minister's Office
